bloque_main_1_1.texto: In MIM Spare, we want to offer you the best selection of food products, as well as service to farmers and stockbreeders. The vocation and passion for our work makes us enjoy what we do every day..
bloque_main_1_2.texto: We have products of excellent quality with a wide variety and, above all, with extensive knowledge to advise and recommend the best solutions for each situation.
bloque_main_2_1.texto: In addition, we have our own lactic workshop, where we produce cottage cheese and extraordinary fresh cheese, as well as an oil mill to produce exquisite oil in the most traditional way.
bloque_main_2_2.texto: In this website, you will find a wide range of products of different varieties that we want to deliver directly to home ensuring the same quality and saving time.
bloque_info.texto: Use us to make any query, either by phone at +34 97887392 and by mail at info@mimspare.com
para_completar_pedido.texto: To complete the order, you must first provide a correct shipping address and email
text3main.texto: Standard product: electrical cable, hardware, etc
correo_ok.texto: The email has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible.
descripcion_categoria_01.texto: Here you will find the personal protective equipment (PPE) products.
descripcion_categoria_02.texto: Here you will find general machinery products.
descripcion_categoria_03.texto: Here you will find the engine products.
descripcion_categoria_04.texto: Here you will find the products in stock.
ya_puedes_descargar_catalogo.texto: You can download our catalogue now!
compre_ahora.texto: Buy now. Shipping 24/48 hours. Personalized customer service. Free Shipping over 40‚Ç¨. Minimum 2 year guarantee. Minimum price guaranteed. More than 800.000 Products. More than 5,000 manufacturers.
bloque_aboutus_1.texto: We are committed to our customers and we draw strength from their faith on our ability to help them better than others. We automate internal processes to be fast and effective.
bloque_aboutus_2.texto: We regularly introduce new products and always in search of the most advanced technologies at the best price. If you have a new product to offer, you are welcome to contact us.
bloque_aboutus_3.texto: We offer products at a reasonable price, at best quality, always reliable performance and with effective after sales service support. Our employees are given opportunity to prove themselves. Selected persons are sent abroad for sales, service and training. We trust them and rely on their abilities to serve our customers to the best possible extent.
bloque_aboutus_4.texto: We are proud of our products, our employees and our customer's faith on us and support given by them.
